name: A Christmas Blast
description:
THE YEAR IS 1988... HAVE A BLAST AT THE NAKATOMI CHRISTMAS PARTY! USE YOUR ELECTRONIC INPUTS TO MAKE SURE EVERYONE IS HAVING A GOOD TIME. YIPPEE KI YAY GUEST!

A Christmas Blast is a fast-paced mini-game extravaganza. At the Nakatomi Christmas party, every guest has a problem to solve:

  • Help John welcome Al to the party.
  • Help Elis show John the watch.
  • Help Theo hack the Nakatomi Trading Corporation's high security vault carrying $640 million of bearer bonds.

But keep an eye on the time! The party is over at 10:30pm.

For MAC & PC!

A Christmas Blast was made in cooperation with the Idle Thumbs community. ACB is a proud partner of Wizard Jam 8.
